summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the expansion and development of hygiene/day center services and facilities; creating a Hygiene/Day Center Development and Construction Subfund in the General Fund; transferring into such subfund certain monies in the Cumulative Reserve Subfund (00164), Unrestricted Subaccount, to pay for development or expansion of hygiene/day center facilities and services in the city; and directing the Executive to develop a plan for expansion and development of hygiene/day center services and facilities.
